item.description: Enjoy the sounds of this fabulous music. Remember listening to the oldies? This is going to be a blast! There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm for everyone to enjoy. DJ - Rockinâ€™ Ron , dress casual, and door prizes. Admission $17. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central Street: I-84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end about 1.5 miles, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at the admission's table.
